MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Heol Celyn and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:45AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.40PM on 8th November 2020.
